name: wpuf_automation
description: End-to-end tests for WordPress User Frontend plugin

scripts.test:parallel:lite: CI=false npx playwright test --config=playwright.parallel-lite-one.config.ts; CI=false npx playwright test --config=playwright.parallel-lite-two.config.ts
scripts.test:parallel:pro: CI=false npx playwright test --config=playwright.parallel-pro-one.config.ts; CI=false npx playwright test --config=playwright.parallel-pro-two.config.ts
scripts.test:sharded:lite: npm run test:setup; npm run test:parallel:lite
scripts.test:sharded:pro: npm run test:setup; npm run test:parallel:pro
scripts.test:parallel:lite:ci: npx playwright test --config=playwright.parallel-lite-one.config.ts; npx playwright test --config=playwright.parallel-lite-two.config.ts
scripts.test:parallel:pro:ci: npx playwright test --config=playwright.parallel-pro-one.config.ts; npx playwright test --config=playwright.parallel-pro-two.config.ts
scripts.test:sharded:lite:ci: npm run test:setup:ci; npm run test:parallel:lite:ci
scripts.test:sharded:pro:ci: npm run test:setup:ci; npm run test:parallel:pro:ci
